Class Map

java.lang.Object
application.Map
public class Map extends Object
Represents the game map containing cells, enemies, and game layout. Constructs the game world based on the selected difficulty level.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Map(Miner miner, GameModel model, Difficulty difficulty)
    Constructs a new map with the specified difficulty.

  • Constructor Details

    • Map

      public Map(Miner miner, GameModel model, Difficulty difficulty)
      Constructs a new map with the specified difficulty.
      Parameters:
      miner - the player character
      model - the game model for cell interactions
      difficulty - the difficulty level determining map layout
